# identifier

**Instance Property**

The string that you use internally to identify the action.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var identifier: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The system passes this string to the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIApplicationDelegate/application(_:handleActionWithIdentifier:for:completionHandler:)] or [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIApplicationDelegate/application(_:handleActionWithIdentifier:forRemoteNotification:completionHandler:)] method of the app delegate when the user chooses the action.

## Getting the action information

- **title**: The localized string to use as the button title for the action.
